text:
="preserve">Thailand TESOL is an academic and professional association that helps teachers of English as a Foreign Language (EFL). It is often called "ThaiTESOL" for short.
Annual conference.
ThaiTESOL has a conference every year with papers, keynote speakers, workshops, and social events.
Partners.
Thai TESOL has relationships with several other language teaching associations including KOTESOL and the Japan Association for Language Teaching.
